resources.string: Dribble - the anonymous geosocial networking application
Number of Drib Topics to display

Dribble

Created By:
Andrew Paverd
Ashleigh Campbell
Daniel Mankowitz
Chad Epstein

Maps Tab: Click to see where you are and surrounding subjects.

Subjects Tab: Discover subjects from the area around you. Click on a subject to retrieve its Dribs.

Dribs Tab: View Dribs for a particular subject and like/dislike them. Click 'reply' to reply to the subject.

New Tab: Creates a new Drib, click 'Submit' to send.
